features: FRAGRANCE FREE MOISTURIZER - We've created the Jergens Ultra Healing you know and love as an unscented lotion, and dermatologist tested as a sensitive skin lotion
HELPS RELIEVE DRY SKIN - Jergens Ultra Healing Fragrance Free Moisturizer helps to improve skin's appearance and texture
LOTION FOR DRY SKIN - Absorbs into extra dry skin, including typically rough spots like heels, elbows, and knees, penetrating five layers of your skin’s surface to reduce dryness at the source
VISIBLY HEALTHIER SKIN - With continual use of Jergens Ultra Healing Fragrance Free Dry Skin Moisturizer, skin is nourished and looks visibly healthier over time
FORMULATED WITH QUALITY INGREDIENTS - A unique fragrance free lotion formulation, with HYDRALUCENCE blend of ingredients, combined with Vitamins C, E and B5
body.description: Repair dryness at the source with Fragrance Free Jergens Ultra Healing Moisturizer for Extra Dry Skin. The nourishing sensitive skin lotion formula penetrates through five layers of skin’s surface to heal extra dry skin, improve tone and texture. This fragrance free lotion formula absorbs to soften areas that tend to need the most moisture like heels, elbows, and knees. How? This body moisturizer features a unique HYDRALUCENCE blend of ingredients plus Vitamins C, E, and B5. This cruelty free and paraben free, hydrating body lotion leaves your skin luminous and moisturized for up to 48 hours. Fragrance Free Jergens Ultra Healing Moisturizer for Extra Dry Skin is manufactured using 100% certified renewable energy. The formula is safe for the environment by maximizing biodegradability and respecting aquatic life. That’s a part of our JERGENS KINDNESS COMMITMENT–being kind to people and our planet. OUR STORY: Since 1901, Jergens skin care has been the trusted brand for comforting moisture. That’s because everything we do is designed to help you feel good – soothing relief from dryness, a touch of summer color, a fruity scent that makes Monday feel like Friday. We’re here to help you feel truly, deeply, skin-to-soul comfortable. We bottle all that up into the Feel-Good Feeling of Jergens. Satisfaction Guarantee. Limitations may apply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Each JERGENS product is specially formulated to smooth away dryness and bring out glowing, healthier-looking skin. From our classic Daily Moisturisers to our innovations like JERGENS Natural Glow products, our moisturisers continue to go beyond the ordinary to help your skin look its best–so your unique beauty can radiate from the inside out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect for the winter dryness it's not sticky or oily but it would be too heavy for the summer. perfect dry skin eraser

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fountain of youth
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this product for several months and am shocked to see how it’s reduced the crepy wrinkles on my arms and neck. I’m now 70 and my skin looks much younger. I wish I’d known what a difference a great moisturizer makes! And no greasy feeling at all. Highly recommend for any age!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used forever. This is the best lotion in the Jergens line of many different lotions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nothing but the best
reviews.reviewText: This is the only lotion I use. It is not greasy but has great coverage. I am addicted.
